MemoryInfobox.name: Positive Change
MemoryInfobox.description: 'After Kassandra spared the life of a Pratinos|fisherman, his wife hoped that the 'misthios' would be kind enough to help their district again by making a delivery.'

General_Description: '''Positive Change''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Dialogue:
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Can I help you, [[merchant]]?''
*'''Woman:''' ''You! Oh, my [[Pratinos|husband]] told me about how you spared his life in the [[Fishing District|fishing district]].''
<tabber>
|-|Your husband meant well.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Well, your husband could have been in a lot of trouble threatening a man like the politician [[Metiochos]], but I know he and his friends meant well.''
|-|He should be careful.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Your husband should be more careful. He and his friends could have gotten in a lot of trouble threatening the politician Metiochos.''
</tabber>
*'''Woman:''' ''Of course, you're right. But he took your advice, and a bunch of us [[Athens|Athenians]] have gotten together to help the fishing district... and now we need your help again, too.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm listening.''
*'''Woman:''' ''I'm too busy tending my stall, but I need to deliver these new sandals made for a local beggar. We have a clothing drive here now. See? I told you we're turning things around. All thanks to you.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''And you want me to deliver it to him.''
*'''Woman:''' ''Yes, simple enough. It needs to arrive in one piece.''
(Accept - I'll handle it.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm in.''
*'''Woman:''' ''You're a gods-send.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''We're done here.''
Kassandra left the woman and sought out the beggar.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''A merchant told me you'd want this.''
*'''Man:''' ''Perfect timing, ''misthios''. Let me repay you.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra helped the merchant deliver the sandals, and was rewarded for this.
Section_Trivia: *The quest is triggered by dealing peacefully with the fishermen in [[A Venomous Encounter]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
